Finally I've found the solution, follow this guide:

1). Extract the "Command And Conquer Red Alert 2 (v1.006) + Yuri's Revenge (v1.001).7z"...

2). Open the folder and search for the "Ra2.exe" for Red Alert 2 or "RA2MD.exe" for Yuri's Revenge. Right-Click the desired .exe file you want to play and click properties. Then choose compatibility mode and run this program in Windows 98.

NOTE: I'm using Windows XP SP3 and it works for me. I'm not sure if this guide works in Windows 7 and Vista..
